plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: Text Transfer
plugins.description: It is often necessary to copy and past text into certain elements in the design. I couldn't find a plugin that allows this to be done quickly and easily, so I decided to create one. It enables you to select multiple elements, copy the text, and paste him into other elements one by one.

plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

plugins.name: SnapCap
plugins.description:
Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your FigJam board or Figma Design file in a single click, making it easier than ever to document user experiences as you browse the web.


Please note that to use SnapCap, you will also need to install the companion Chrome extension at snapcap.app/extension


How to Use SnapCap

Installation

  1. Install the Figma plugin
  2. Install the Chrome browser extension, and pin it


Session Setup

  1. Open the FigJam board or Figma Design file where you wish to send screenshots
  2. Launch the Figma plugin and click "Start new session"
  3. Copy the generated session code
  4. Click on the SnapCap browser extension and enter the copied session code


Taking Screenshots

Once your session has connected, click on the SnapCap browser extension anytime you want to take a screenshot and send it to your Figma file. A check mark will be shown on the extension icon to indicate that the screenshot was captured successfully, and it will show up moments later in the Figma file where the FigCap plugin is running.


Ending Session

When you are done taking screenshots, click the End button. If the SnapCap browser extension does not automatically disconnect, you can right click on the extension icon and select "End session"


Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/
plugins.tagline: Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your Figma files

Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: AI Brand Guide
plugins.description:
AI Brand Guide transforms your design files into comprehensive, professional brand guides in seconds. Extract and organize design elements from your Figma files to create beautiful, developer-friendly documentation.


Key Features

  1. Intelligent Design Element Categorization: Automatically organizes your elements into Buttons, Icons, and Other Elements based on naming patterns
  2. Multi-Frame Export: Choose between Single Frame (all sections in one scrollable frame) or Separate Frames (each section in its own dedicated frame)
  3. Color Palette Extraction: Automatically extracts colors from your selection with detailed RGB, HEX, and HSL values
  4. AI-Powered Color Naming: Generate professional, creative names for your color palette with a single click
  5. Color Theory Generation: Create comprehensive color theory documentation including palette overview, color roles, visual qualities, and usage recommendations
  6. Typography Hierarchy System: Extracts and organizes typography into a structured system with Header and Paragraph classifications
  7. Component Documentation: Displays detailed specifications for buttons, icons and other elements including exact dimensions and padding values
  8. Visual Previews: Generates thumbnail previews for all design elements
  9. Form Element Detection: Special handling for contact forms and other form elements with improved display


How It Works

  1. Select your design elements in Figma (frames, components, or entire pages)
  2. Generate your brand guide with a single click
  3. Customize your guide: Rename colors, add color theory, or organize elements
  4. Export to Figma: Choose your preferred layout style and generate a complete brand guide directly in your Figma file


Element Categorization

For best results, use these naming patterns:

  1. Buttons: Include "btn" or "button" in the name (e.g., "btn-primary", "submit-button")
  2. Icons: Include "icn" or "icon" in the name (e.g., "icn-home", "arrow-icon")
  3. Other Elements: Include "element" or "other" in the name (e.g., "card-element", "other-banner")


What's Included in Your Brand Guide

  1. Color Palette: Complete color documentation with visual swatches and color codes
  2. Typography System: Organized type hierarchy with font details and visual examples
  3. Buttons Collection: All button variants with exact dimensions and padding specifications
  4. Icon Library: Organized icon set with dimensions and specifications
  5. Additional Elements: Cards, banners, forms and other UI components with detailed measurements
  6. Color Theory: Optional section providing insights on palette psychology, symbolism and usage


AI Brand Guide helps design teams maintain consistency while giving developers the exact specifications they need to implement designs accurately.
plugins.tagline: Transform designs into comprehensive brand guides with AI-powered color intelligence.

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.description:
Pixabay Illustrations Library is a powerful Figma plugin that brings you an extensive collection of high-quality illustrations directly from Pixabay. With thousands of unique designs at your fingertips, you can easily enhance your projects and inspire creativity. Whether you're working on web designs, presentations, or marketing materials, our library offers diverse styles to suit any theme.


Key Features:


Vast Collection: Access thousands of free illustrations in various styles and categories.

Easy Integration: Seamlessly add illustrations to your designs without leaving Figma.

Search Functionality: Quickly find the perfect illustration using keywords or categories.

High-Quality Graphics: All images are royalty-free and suitable for commercial use.

Transform your design workflow with the Pixabay Illustrations Library and watch your creativity soar!

plugins.name: Paste Large Images
plugins.description:
Stop wasting time saving huge reference screenshots to disk—just paste or import them directly into your file, at full quality.


What it does

  1. 🥸 Paste or select file: Use ⌘ + V / Ctrl + V or click “select file” to bring in any image.
  2. 🔪 Smart slicing: Large images are automatically chopped into Figma-friendly tiles, so you never lose resolution.
  3. 🚀 Instant placement: Your screenshot drops right into view, wrapped in a frame or a group—no extra steps, no quality loss.
plugins.tagline: Instantly paste or insert high-resolution screenshots into Figma

plugins.name: Real Data Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data — perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views
plugins.tagline: Fill selected text layers with real-looking names, emails, cities, and more

plugins.name: Slot Swapper
plugins.description:
Slot swapper lets you reorder the nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

  1. Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).
  2. Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Currently does not support nested instances with boolean component properties. Fix will be released soon!


This plugin is open-source. Contributions are welcome!

https://github.com/Connagh/slot-swapper-figma-plugin
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

plugins.name: E-ImageCompression
plugins.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.
plugins.tagline: Optimize images in one click

137038.name: E-ImageCompression
137038.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin uses TinyPNG API for image compression. Since TinyPNG API doesn't support CORS directly, we use a CORS proxy (cors.siteceterum.ru) for secure API communication.

plugins.name: Component Description Search
plugins.description: Figma lets you add rich descriptions to your components—but the built-in search only looks at layer names, component titles, and text nodes. Component Description Search fills the gap: instantly find and filter components by their descriptions, right inside your Figma file.
plugins.tagline: Finally search within your component descriptions

136687.description: Figma lets you add rich descriptions to your components—but the built-in search only looks at layer names, component titles, and text nodes. Component Description Search fills the gap: instantly find and filter components by their descriptions, right inside your Figma file.

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

136575.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
136575.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: figma to testcase
plugins.description: Transform your Figma designs into comprehensive test cases with just a few clicks. This powerful plugin analyzes your UI elements and generates detailed test scenarios for functional, security, accessibility, and performance testing. Export your test cases directly to TestRail or Zephyr in CSV format, maintaining exact UI text and interactions. Perfect for designers, developers, and QA teams looking to streamline their testing workflow and ensure product quality.
plugins.tagline: From Design to Test Cases in One Click

136494.name: figma to testcase
136494.description: Transform your Figma designs into comprehensive test cases with just a few clicks. Export your test cases directly to TestRail or Zephyr in CSV format, maintaining exact UI text and interactions. Perfect for designers, developers, and QA teams looking to streamline their testing workflow and ensure product quality.
136494.tagline: From Design to Test Cases in One Click

plugins.name: Typographica
plugins.description:
Typographica helps you quickly create beautiful and balanced font combinations for any project — from corporate dashboards to creative websites.


The plugin analyzes your chosen primary font, project style, and font metrics to generate harmonious font pairs automatically.


What does Typographica do?


  1. Generates Primary + Secondary + Accent font combinations
  2. Takes into account your project style (7 styles: business, corporate, modern, elegant, fun, personal, minimalist)
  3. Analyzes font metrics (x-height, glyph width, weight, stylistic characteristics)
  4. Automatically filters out fonts that do not fit the selected style
  5. Lets you save combinations as Figma text styles and variables
  6. Optionally adds smart descriptions to generated styles
  7. Supports manual swapping of secondary and accent fonts
  8. Works with any available fonts — Google Fonts, local fonts, and Figma-supported fonts


Who is it for?


  1. Product designers — to quickly build solid typography systems
  2. UX/UI designers — to improve readability and visual rhythm
  3. Brand designers — to find well-balanced and creative font pairs
  4. Beginners — to get guidance on what fonts work well together
  5. Experienced designers — to save time and explore unexpected combinations


How does it work?


  1. Choose your project style
  2. Select a Primary Font
  3. Click Change Pairs
  4. Browse the generated font pairs and accent options
  5. Save styles or variables in one click
  6. Tweak and refine as needed


Why use Typographica?


Save time — no more manual font pairing

Get better quality — pairs are based on font metrics and style fit, not guesswork

Flexible — works for classic and modern designs alike

Customizable — easy to adjust pairs or generate new ones on the fly


Styles and Tokens Support


Typographica not only generates font pairs, but also helps you create full-fledged text styles and design tokens in Figma.


You can save your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts as reusable Text Styles and optionally as Variables (Tokens) — making your typography consistent across your project and design system.


Style Description Table


Typographica can automatically generate a style description table for your font system — right inside Figma.


It creates a clear, editable table summarizing your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts, with suggested usage and style notes.


Perfect for documenting typography choices or sharing with your team and developers.


Typographica is your smart font pairing assistant in Figma. Make your typography cleaner, more beautiful, and more consistent — with less effort.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Font Pair Generator for Figma
